pluginstrument.description:
This instrument was developed as an easy way to interface the Knobster with your sim without actually having any visual interface for a radio, GPS or any other regular aircraft instrument.
It was developed having VR in mind, in which all we need is an interface with the sim and not the visual representation of it on a monitor.
You can select the different functions for the knobs and the push button from dropdown lists. I made it for X-Plane only but you can adapt it for your sim of choice.
